REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0288 reute u f BC-TAIWAN-ISSUES-12-BILL 03-09 0069

TEXT.TITLE: TAIWAN ISSUES 12 BILLION DLRS OF BONDS
TEXT.BODY: The central bank has issued 12 billion Taiwan dlrs worth of one and two year savings bonds to help curb the growth of M-1b money supply, a bank spokesman said. The new bonds bear interest rates ranging from five to 5.25 pct and will be sold to the public, he said. The bank issued eight billion Taiwan dlrs worth of similar bonds last month. REUTER
